title: Forever in Her Dreams
description: "Forever In Her Dreams" is the second book in "The Eyes of Innocence" series by Tika Newman. Sixteen-year-old Kalina is a gifted psychic and healer. Her tumultuous life is suddenly riddled with unanswered questions. She is aware that someone is watching her, but why? Where did the beautiful mare come from? Could she be the inexplicable phantom horse? Will Kalina see her again? Dreams continue to haunt Kalina as the mysteries begin to unfold. Kalina's life is about to explode with excitement.
author: Tika Newman
